definitions.definition: To become less severe or intense; to become less hard, harsh, or cruel; to soften in temper
definitions.example: He had planned to ground his son for a month, but relented and decided to give him a stern lecture instead.
He will not relent in his effort to reclaim his victory.

definitions.definition: To lessen, make less severe or intense.
(of substance) To become less rigid or hard; to soften; to yield, for example by dissolving or melting
